frameDefinitions: A Topical_entity has properties which are affected by the existence and association of an Entity.
An Agent begins preventing a Captive from moving despite a tendency or desire on the part of the Captive to do so.
In this frame a Preventing_cause interferes with the ability of a Protagonist to complete an intended Action.
An Item becomes filled with a Substance as a result of movement of liquid into visible or invisible interstices in the Item.
A Speaker communicates about a Topic in such a way as to mislead an Addressee, either by telling outright lies or by presenting a message in a misleading form.
An Event with multiple Participants takes place.
frameExamples: By the 1920s a characteristic book <t>had</t> black and white photographic illustrations only .
Authorities recently <t>captured</t> several suspects who were hiding in a remote mountain area.
Paper and board <t>absorb</t> moisture in the winter.
I <t>lied</t> to you about your Christmas present.
MATAC looks forward to your <t>participation</t> in helping promote telework in the Mid-Atlantic region.
listRoleDefinitions: Some entity, abstract or concrete, which is stated to exist and be associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>.
The entity under discussion, whose states and properties are impacted by its association with the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Entity</fen> exists and is associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>
The place where the <fen>Entity</fen> is associated with the <fen>Topical_entity</fen>.
The entity which is captured.
The <fen>Agent</fen> brings the <fen>Captive</fen> into custody.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-sentient entity which is responsible for restricting the movement or location of the <fen>Captive</fen>.
When the event occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event occurs.
The <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> is the agent or force who keeps the <fen>Protagonist</fen> from completing her or his planned <fen>Action</fen>.
The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is the individual or group of individuals who have a planned <fen>Action</fen> which is prevented by the <fen>Preventing_cause</fen>
The <fen>Action</fen> is the action or event certain individuals desire to bring about which is prevented by the <fen>Preventing_cause</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the thwarting occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the thwarting occurs.
The <fen>Item</fen> is the absorbant friendly thing that takes in the <fen>Substance</fen>.
The <fen>Substance</fen> is the material that is taken in by the <fen>Item</fen>.
When the <fen>Item</fen> takes in <fen>Substance</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Item</fen> takes in <fen>Substance</fen>.
The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey a deceptive Message to the Addressee.
The person that receives a Message from the Speaker.
<fen>Topic</fen> is the entity to which the proposition or propositions  relate, that they are about.
The time at which the deception occurs.
The location at which the deception occurs.
The individuals or entities that have been participants in an <fen>Event</fen>.
<fen>Participant_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
A grammatically less prominent participant of an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
An <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>, who may or may not be involved intentionally.
A group, location, or institution conventionally associated with an <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the multiple-participant <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
The location where the <fen>Event</fen> involving multiple <fen>Participants</fen> occurs.
listRoleExamples: Police have captured <fex>three of the suspected bombers</fex> after a week-long search.
<fex>Authorities</fex> recently captured several suspects who were hiding in a remote mountain area.
Authorities secured the target <fex>in a private residence</fex>.
<fex>Politicians</fex> do nothing but tell lies about money.
You deceived me <fex>about the location of the diamonds</fex>.
Thereafter, <fex>everybody</fex> participated in the 17 May parade ending in the Nordic Club.
Last year, <fex>Bill</fex> participated in the Montana State University Earth Systems Science distance learning course in the Atmosphere Unit.

The Second Amended Complaint alleges that Andrew S. Pitt ('Pitt'), Conectisys Corporation ('Conectisys' or the 'Company'), and BM
Capital Corp. participated <fex>with Zaman and Smith Benton</fex> in a fraudulent and manipulative trading scheme.
Some who participated <fex>in D-Day</fex> are finally ready to talk about it
Several of the countries were unable to participate <fex>in the market</fex> .

A survey of students who participated <fex>last year</fex> showed that 61 percent would be the
first in their family to attend college.
The most exciting tours for Mr. Osako were when he participated <fex>in France, Belgium, Holland, Cuba and Japan</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Institute of Geographic Sciences and Natural Resources Research
the Research Centre for Eco-Environmental Sciences
the Institution of Nutrition and Food Safety
the China Environmental Remediation Industry Association
